duties_responsibilities.duty: Reconciling the daily cash activity and monthly kiosk cash reconciliations
Assisting in the reconciliation of company’s bank accounts and review customer wires to provide support to shipping and sales
Creating wire transactions and recording journal entries related to cash, payroll, and various accruals
Working with the real estate team and creating the monthly rent payment files

BA Business, Accounting, or related field required. 2-4 years of accounting experience. Experience with ERP systems, Oracle preferred. Strong reconciliation and analytic skills. Intermediate to Advanced in MS Excel. Excellent time management and strong communication skills.

education_certification.credential: BA Business, Accounting or related field required. 2-4 years of accounting experience. Experience with ERP systems required; Oracle preferred. Strong reconciliation and analytic skills. Intermediate to Advanced in MS Excel. Excellent time management and strong communication skills.
